Series.Actors: |Julia Louis-Dreyfus|Anna Chlumsky|Tony Hale|Timothy Simons|Matt Walsh|Reid Scott|Sufe Bradshaw|
Series.Overview: From Armando Iannucci (The Thick of It) comes a look into American politics, revolving around former Senator Selina Meyer (Julia Louis-Dreyfus) who finds being Vice President of the United States is nothing like she expected and everything everyone ever warned her about.
